DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct collect data management major bleed event occur patient atrial fibrillation take dabigatran etexilate .
DOC.brief_title: Management Major Bleeding Events Atrial Fibrillation Patients Using Pradaxa
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Greater equal 18 year age ; Confirmed diagnosis non valvular atrial fibrillation ( NVAF ) ( Diagnosis AF consider confirmed medical chart documentation patient atrial fibrillation AF ICD9 ICD10 code AF document ) ; NVAF define follow : nonvalvular atrial fibrillation restrict case rhythm disturbance occur absence rheumatic mitral stenosis prosthetic heart valve . Documentation patient present emergency department/emergency room ( ED/ER ) major bleed event ( index event ) ; Major bleeding define International Society Thrombosis Haemostasis ( ISTH ) : fatal bleeding and/or symptomatic bleeding critical area/organ intracranial , intraspinal , intraocular , retroperitoneal , intraarticular pericardial , intramuscular compartment syndrome , and/or bleed cause fall hemoglobin 20g per liter , lead transfusion 2 unit whole blood red blood cell Documentation index event occur patient report take least one dose dabigatran within 5 day prior index event . Exclusion criterion : Confirmed diagnosis valvular AF ( Diagnosis valvular AF consider confirmed medical chart documentation patient valvular AF VAF . In absence documentation indicate whether patient nonvalvular valvular AF , ) ; Documentation patient take dabigatran concomitant anticoagulant ( contemporaneous parenteral anticoagulant another oral anticoagulant ) within 72 hour index event ; The concomitant administration antiplatelet medication prior onset index event exclusionary ; Documentation patient receive thrombolytic therapy within 48 hour onset index event ; Documentation patient enrol interventional investigational BI observational clinical trial time onset index event ; Medical record retrievable , miss empty .
